Note:
Cf. the Latin lines in Wright and Halliwell-Phillipps (1845)
XThomas Wright, and James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps. Reliquiae Antiquae. 2 vols. London: Smith, 1845, 1.90 and cf. 1173.3, 2021, 2783.
Subjects: clergy, sins of; sermons, verse in
_description: On clerics lazy in their liturgy, a tag in the Fasciculus morum, normally seven lines, aabcbcb

Bod187.First Lines:
longe sleperis & ouer lepersbe fore skyppers & ouer
                    hypperys…
Bod187.Last Lines:
…I em nat herys but þey buth mynebut þey hem a mendy
                    þey shulle with me to pyne

                Universitäts-Schriften.
Philosophische Fakultät, Texte und Untersuchung zur Englischen
                Philologie.
         Band 1. München, 1973: 33.
